channel.title: Video Cards
channel.description: Im finally going to get a new video card, so my computer supports new games and such...Does anyone know of a cheap but good quality video card?

item.title: Video Cards
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:6, topic:427646”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=530342.msg3872464#msg3872464 date=1325447850]
Current Video card: NIVIDA geforce 6150se nforce 430
PSU: 550w (–Im not sure about this, i just looked up the PC model specs online)
[/quote]
Since your budget is low. Get a Geforce 520 GT they’re like 60$ on newegg. I got the 560 GT from there and I think the whole series run fantastic.[/quote]

thx i will.

[quote=“rip4d, post:8, topic:427646”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=530342.msg3872464#msg3872464 date=1325447850]
Current Video card: NIVIDA geforce 6150se nforce 430
PSU: 550w (–Im not sure about this, i just looked up the PC model specs online)
[/quote]Quick question, is your computer an HP Slimline model? Because that is an integrated card in my motherboard, and my power supply is 220W. If we do have the same model, then I’m afraid your budget is way too low considering you’d need a slim PSU (which is notably more expensive than average PSUs).[/quote]

nah, i dont, lol

Read full topic

item.title: Video Cards
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:5, topic:427646”]Current Video card: NIVIDA geforce 6150se nforce 430
PSU: 550w (–Im not sure about this, i just looked up the PC model specs online)[/quote]Quick question, is your computer an HP Slimline model? Because that is an integrated card in my motherboard, and my power supply is 220W. If we do have the same model, then I’m afraid your budget is way too low considering you’d need a slim PSU (which is notably more expensive than average PSUs).

Read full topic

item.title: Video Cards
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:3, topic:427646”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=530342.msg3872381#msg3872381 date=1325444695]
What would you class as cheap, ie, what is your budget?
And what do you need it to play, exactly what games?
[/quote]
my budget would be up to $60 (possibly more if needed, but im planning on getting more RAM)
and with games, Just about any new game (HD shooting mainly) ( ie, Rage, Portal 2, battlefield 3, MW3, etc)[/quote]
You’ll struggle to get anything that’ll play Battlefield 3 at higher than low settings for that price

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:5, topic:427646”]Current Video card: NIVIDA geforce 6150se nforce 430
PSU: 550w (–Im not sure about this, i just looked up the PC model specs online)[/quote]
Since your budget is low. Get a Geforce 520 GT they’re like 60$ on newegg. I got the 560 GT from there and I think the whole series run fantastic.
